name: Find My Friend
description:
You need to find your friend in a massive group of people but can't remember exactly how they look! Use clues you remember and match them against people you come across to get more information. 

How to Play:

Find My Friend is a puzzle game in which you match people together according to similar facial features (i.e. hair, eyes, nose, mouth, ears). Each turn, a new facial trait type is selected and you can only match players of matching features based on that trait (e.g. matches are based on mouths when the mouth trait is selected). Get points towards new clues by making matches with faces that contain the target feature. Be careful, if your current match does not contain anyone with the target feature, you will lose a life. Lose all your lives and it is game over! Once you have collected enough clues, you'll be able to find your friend!

Controls: 

Left Click and drag to make your selection and let go to confirm. 
Right Click to cancel your current selection.

Best played in full screen mode, enjoy!
